mapper.insert: insert into t_funtime_user_account_yaoyao_record (user_id, type, draw_random, draw_info, draw_amount,basic_amount,user_amont,pool_amount, pool_percent,user_exchange_amount) values (#{userId}, #{type}, #{drawRandom}, #{drawInfo}, #{drawAmount}, #{basicAmount},#{userAmont},#{poolAmount},#{poolPercent},#{userExchangeAmount})
